lines.text: You'd be lovely to have around, just to sprinkle the flowers with your personality.
I never go back on a coin.
Just a New York cowboy aren't you? Passing through and giving a little small town girl her big moment.
The girl who lands him will say no and put an anchor on it... But isn't it tough when all you can think of is yes?

[to Babe about the lake party]
It's too lonesome, no subway, no elevator... None of the rushing noise of the city.
Just pale moon, quiet lake, soft breeze, hardly rustling the pine leaves...
[Snaps back to reality and looks at Babe]
Oh, I've been busy leading my usual life of sin.
